title: Snowdown Sale?
body: Rito said it would be avaliable at 17:00 on the 16th of Decemeber. Just wondering what the deal is, want to have a look before work! :)

replies.body:
Hey riot can you please release the snowdown store i've been waiting half an hour since ur release time
PLZ HELP ASAP
ikr bit annoying but hey i'd rather a fully functioning store than a glitchy piece of trash that takes RP and does nothing else
actually that sounds fun, because then they must refund you, and give 10% bonus refund for the inconvenience
hmmmm interesting but it's still not out ;-;

its out. got toxic dr mundo -.- i want a redo rito.

and every other sale i already have that champs best skin...

3.5 hours later and yet still nothing ;-; 
i would like to get these sales cos i got rp

An hour and a half later and still no word. You would at least think one of the rioter would have the curtesy to tell us  whats going on. Even if its a simple, sorry we messed up the timings here is the updated scheduled release. Is that so hard? The only other thing I can think is that a employee mistook 17:00 for 7pm. With this the actual time would 19:00 which I believe is 12 midnight in California. 

Have to leave to work now {{item:3070}} .. the wait continues!
